name: WexoQuickpay

infos.name: QuickPay
infos.description:
Mit diesem QuickPay Payment Gateway-Plugin können Sie alle gängigen Zahlungsmethoden in Ihrem Webshop akzeptieren - Kreditkarten, mobile Zahlungen, Rechnungen.


Dieses Plugin wurde von WEXO A/S als inoffizielle Integration zwischen Quickpay / Pensopay-Zahlungen und Shopware 6 entwickelt.
infos.shortDescription: Online-Zahlungsdienste für den E-Commerce. Mit diesem Plugin können Sie alle gängigen Zahlungsmethoden akzeptieren - Kreditkarten, mobile Zahlungen, Rechnungen und mehr.
infos.highlights:
Einfach zu installieren und zu verwenden
Bereit für den dänischen und skandinavischen Markt
QuickPay kann verschiedene Zahlungsangebote in derselben Schnittstelle abwickeln
infos.features:
Die gesamte Konfiguration erfolgt direkt in Shopware 6
Erstellt automatisch Zahlungsmethoden in Shopware 6
Dankort, VISA, Mastercard, JCB usw.
MobilePay (dänische mobile Zahlungslösung)

infos.name: QuickPay
infos.description:
With this QuickPay Payment gateway plugin you will be able to accept all common payment methods on your webshop - credit cards, mobile payments, invoices. 

This plugin is developed by WEXO A/S as an unofficial integration between Quickpay / Pensopay payments and Shopware 6.
infos.shortDescription: Online payment services for e-commerce. With this plugin you can accept all common payment methods - credit cards, mobile payments, invoices, and more.
infos.highlights:
Easy to install and use
Ready for the Danish and Scandinavian market
QuickPay can handle different payment provides in same interface
infos.features:
All configuration is done directly in Shopware 6
Automatically creates payment methods in Shopware 6 
Dankort, VISA, Mastercard, JCB etc.
MobilePay (Danish mobile payment solution)

comments.text: We had a bumpy start, but got good support and now the plug-in is running.
comments.headline: Plugin works as expected

comments.text: All it took was 10 minutes to install, and then I got up and running with both credit card payments and Mobilepay no hassle what so ever.
comments.headline: Works great out of the box
Seems like they don't know what's going on.

label: QuickPay
description:
Mit diesem QuickPay Payment Gateway-Plugin können Sie alle gängigen Zahlungsmethoden in Ihrem Webshop akzeptieren - Kreditkarten, mobile Zahlungen, Rechnungen.


Dieses Plugin wurde von WEXO A/S als inoffizielle Integration zwischen Quickpay / Pensopay-Zahlungen und Shopware 6 entwickelt.

changelog.text: • Shopware 6.5 compatible

• Event handling performance optimizations
  • Added settings for disabling capture and cancel payments in QuickPay
• Improve exception logs, include sw_status_code response to quickpay finalize transaction request
• Remove the use of @RouteScope for Shopware 6.5 compatibility
• Go back to checkout confirm page when cancelling in the payment window
• Internal API changes to allow more customizability

• Added Anyday payment method
  • Changed Vipps paymentmethod from vipps to vippspsp, which is Vipps via Quickpay
• Fixing Deprecated Exception message
• Added Vipps as a payment method
• Bugfix when updating plugin and subscription customField already exist
• Bugfix for Swish payment callback and Shopware state transition
• Update so capture function always have the newest info from Quickpay
• Fixed so state changes on non-quickpay payments doesn't trigger quickpay functions
• Fixed API config test button

• Subscriptions added for Quickpay
  • Added Googlepay and Applepay as a payment methods
  • Config to hide payment methods that is not supported in current user-agent

• Added Paypal as a payment method
  • Quickpay payment window will now only show alternative payment methods that are enabled in the current sales channel
• Bugfixes for Swish payment
• Changes to Swish payment:
• Shopware 6.4.9.0 compatibility
• Added Swish as a payment method
• Fixed an issue where manual payment capture failed if order state was "Authorized"
Fixed an issue where payment did not finalize when receiving callback from Quickpay

• Fix for double token invalidation when using MobilePay and Mastercard
  • Shopware 6.4.5.x compatability
• Ensure cart is cleared after succesful payment on Shopware 6.4.4.1
• Fix issue with double token invalidation in Shopware 6.4.3.0

• Use sales channel specific settings for cancel payment
  • Do not try to cancel authorized payments
• Minor tweaks and cleanups. No longer supporting PHP 7.2

• API test of API & private key
  • Fixed order cancel bug

• Shopware 6.4 compatability
  • Callback check
  • Payment and shipping automations

• Viabill added
  • Klarna added
  • Set payment window language based on sales channel language
  • Better callback handling
• Fix the API test button
• Removed need for MobilePay ID in admin config
